commit message:
Added SettingsActivity.
Credentials are stored in SharedPrefs now.
Implemented convenience class for external storage

Implemented Adapter for browsing. Implemented lazy loading for image
icons in Listview
Fixed Actionbar font and added info icon

Fixed minimum Android version to 7. Added Info Activity for later usage
to display basic usage of SparkleShare and this Android app
Added basic settings button to menu
Implemented SplashActivity for setting up user account
Implemented an implicit intent to open downloaded files

Merge pull request #1 from nextsux/master

replaced default icon
Implemented QRCode scanning to link device
Fixed back to root directory in action bar

Merge pull request #2 from nextsux/master

ldpi & mdpi icons

Changed splash screen layout based on wireframe
(https://github.com/hbons/SparkleShare-Design-Corner/blob/master/android/sparkleshare-android.png)

Changed setup layout based on wireframe
(https://github.com/hbons/SparkleShare-Design-Corner/tree/master/android)
Changed SparkleShare logo and fixed some more design issues
Implemented setup screen and fixed some design issues again
Added new icons for file list
Fixed size of home icon and layout of listview items
Implemented loading dialog while waiting for server response
Added dummy buttons for action bar

Merge pull request #3 from hbons/master

Use 'SparkleShare' as the app name
Don't draw a shadow on the welcome text
Fixed bug with browsing (using constant folder id for each git folder)
Fixed text shadow in welcome screen
Add toolbar icons for returning to the overview

Merge pull request #5 from hbons/master

More icons!
Fixed size of info icon in action bar. Included new icons in action bar
included some status bar icons for showing download
link code field: no password. center, numeric

link code field: no password. center, numeric

Use keyboard that shows mostly just numbers for the link code text field

Implemented outstanding action bar buttons with crappy placeholder icons

itself based on the changed settings.
Use text file as the default icon

Some string changes
Manually merged new actionbar icons from ae4c1a2
Manually merged new actionbar icons from ae4c1a2

Implemented a first rough version for displaying downloaded files in the
listview
put checkmark for downloaded files into description
Fixed ActivityNotFoundException when opening downloaded files
Throwing Toasts for unimplemented stuff yet
Fixed silly show hidden files bug
Added some feature information in README

Fixed Bug (ActivityNotFoundException) when Intent was not caught by any
App

Listitem will be updated automatically after downloading the particular
file
Uploaded high res icon for SparkleShare
User will be redirected to Setup Activity after forgetting account

Implemented FileDetailsActivity and moved Asynctask for downloading file
to this Activity
put version number to central place
Removed Add feature which will be implemented in a later version
Removed spending button for implementation in later version
Fix for devices without installed barcode scanner app
Fix for devices without barcode scanner installed

Partly fixes #22. Mismappings are caused by wrong mimetypes given from
the server.
Refactored mimetype guessing in separate class
Large icons will be displayed now when in FileDetailsActivity
Changed layout in FileDetailsActivtiy to one button

Merge pull request #42 from hbons/patch-1

Some string changes
Intent will be broadcast with mime given by server
Added server url to different git folders
hint for sparkleshare dashboard added in strings.xml
Only show host for top level folder address

Merge pull request #44 from hbons/master

Only show host for top level folder address

Changed the Download button to 'Downloadingâ€¦' + disabled state when
downloading
Bugfix: Deleted Activity stack when forgetting current account

changing some minor visual issues. This is version 1.0 released in the
Android Market

Merge pull request #67 from deejay1/translations

Updated translations

Added Android Compatibility Library for further adjusting layout for
tablets

Added new android-integration.jar for using barcode scanning inside a
FragmentActivity (read here:
http://code.google.com/p/zxing/issues/detail?id=958)
Cleanup of unused files and styles

Switched from own implementation of ActionBar to the more 'official'
ActionBarCompat, which fits better inside FragmentActivities
Reimplemented some action bar icons using actionbarcompat implementation
Fixed action bar styles for API > 10

Merge pull request #71 from aspel/master

Add Ukrainian translation

Fix issue https://github.com/NewProggie/SparkleShare-Android/issues/52
This patch allow to open settings in Welcome Screen by menu key and allow change Option
Accept all SSL certificates.

Added the following functionalities:
- Delete a file from Phone
- Re-download a file (helpful if file changes often)
- Showing thumbnails in Detail-View of Images instead of the file icon

Minor Fix and added functionalities

added creation logic for offline directories
changed create directory to work with file path
changed to use item file path

fixed file path bug when URL = null / rootdirectory
